message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $180. I believe it's a great deal for the value it provides. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  I could come down a bit to $165, but $140 is too low for me.  What do you say?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $155. Would you be willing to meet me there?
